long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Travis Report adds an inline overview of your Travis build to Github. Travis Report outlines exactly which Travis Environments failed and gives links directly to their log outputs. 

Can be set to run only when the latest build has failed or regardless of the status of the latest build

Fork on Github - https://github.com/bjubes/travis-report
